com.piggybox.utils.tree

Class TreeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.piggybox.utils.tree.TreeUtils

  • public class TreeUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TreeNode getLowestCommonAncestor(TreeNode t1, TreeNode t2)
      returns the node of a tree which represents the lowest common ancestor of nodes t1 and t2 dominated by root.
      static int leftEdge(TreeNode t, TreeNode root)
      Returns the positional index of the left edge of a tree t within a given root, as defined by the size of the yield of all material preceding t.
      static int rightEdge(TreeNode t, TreeNode root)
      Returns the positional index of the right edge of a tree t within a given root, as defined by the size of the yield of all material preceding t plus all the material contained in t.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getLowestCommonAncestor

        public static TreeNode getLowestCommonAncestor(TreeNode t1,
                               TreeNode t2)
        returns the node of a tree which represents the lowest common ancestor of nodes t1 and t2 dominated by root. If either t1 or t2 is not dominated by root, returns null.
        Parameters:
        t1 -
        t2 -
        root -
        Returns:

      • leftEdge

        public static int leftEdge(TreeNode t,
           TreeNode root)
        Returns the positional index of the left edge of a tree t within a given root, as defined by the size of the yield of all material preceding t.

      • rightEdge

        public static int rightEdge(TreeNode t,
            TreeNode root)
        Returns the positional index of the right edge of a tree t within a given root, as defined by the size of the yield of all material preceding t plus all the material contained in t.
